title: Comrade Trump, Netflix Algorithmic Genius?  12.10.20
itunes:title: Comrade Trump, Netflix Algorithmic Genius?  12.10.20
description:
In episode 776, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by comedian Blake Wexler to discuss conservative TV ratings, the messy Giuliani witness defending herself, Russian media asking Trump to come home, Russians being unimpressed by Covid vaccine, Nick Cage's new Netflix show, Gordon Ramsay's hundred dollar burger, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Newsmax TV scores a ratings win over Fox News for the first time ever
  2. Giuliani witness whose testimony went viral says she isn’t self-quarantining despite his covid-19 diagnosis
  3. Incredible Wow Did Not See This Coming
  4. Russian Media Wants Moscow to Grant Asylum to Trump
  5. Russia's Sputnik V vaccination program has started, but it's facing resistance
  6. Don't mix Sputnik vaccine with alcohol, says Russian official. Some recoil
  7. Putin still hasn't taken Russia's vaccine, months after his daughter did
  8. The Kremlin Is Offering Russians Free Vaccines, but Will They Take Them?
  9. Russian media ‘spreading Covid-19 disinformation’
  10. Why are Russian coronavirus doctors mysteriously falling out of windows?
  11. Nicolas Cage To Host ‘History Of Swear Words’ At Netflix
  12. Oh, good: Gordon Ramsay wants to sell you a $106 burger
  13. Certified good-time guy Gordon Ramsay is launching a hard seltzer line
  14. Blake Wexler: Live From The Pandemic
  15. WATCH: Seneca B - Sunshine

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
